title: Friday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
FRIDAY FISH FUNNIES Episode 14: Knock Knock

THE SWORD OF GOD Episode 53: Gratuitous Robocop Reference

BOB Episode 126: Out of Eden

FLYING SPARKS Episode 66: What Could Go Wrong?

CHATEAU GRIEF Episode 224: Addictionary

WARNING: Arktoons features a number comics written by The Legend Chuck Dixon. We are reliably informed by Marvel Comics that this means reader discretion is advised, and that if you are struggling with thoughts of suicide, or are worried about a friend or loved one, you should reach out to a counselor or someone you trust.

Chuck is dangerous, Marvel… man. He addresses this, and other recent attacks on him, on UATV.

DISCUSS ON SG
